HIDConnectionEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The HIDConnectionEvent interface of the WebHID API represents HID connection events, and is the event type passed to and event handlers when a device's connection state changes.

HIDConnectionEventDevice.summary: NOTE Experimental The device read-only property of the interface returns the associated with this connection event.

HIDConnectionEventHIDConnectionEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The HIDConnectionEvent() constructor creates a new object. Typically this constructor is not used as events are created when a device's connection state changes.
